headline: Boeing Orders And Defense Wins Test Valuation Gap And Labor Risks
summary: In January, Boeing reported one of its strongest recent months for aircraft orders and deliveries, including a substantial widebody order from Delta Air Lines. The company secured significant long term U.S. Air Force contracts tied to C-17A fleet upgrades. Boeing announced plans for a new 737 Max assembly line while unions raised concerns about potential job relocations to South Carolina. Boeing (NYSE:BA) enters this news cycle with its shares at $236.26 and a 1 year return of 26.9%. Over 3...
